main event: A civilian in Jamaica, Long Island, New York, reported a sighting of a black, block-long, gray-whitish object moving and changing course before disappearing from view just before daybreak.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-10 minutes, with no photographs available.
The object was described as one block long and gray-whitish in color, traveling in the east direction at a mile above ground.
The witness, driving a car, reported clear, haze-free sky conditions with excellent visibility.
The source was located in Jamaica, Long Island, NY, and the report was made by a civilian, with the coordination of the Air Force.
The Air Force requested additional information on the observed object's size, elevation, azimuth, and the witness's direction of motion.
